home.about_us_text: We're dedicated to protecting marine life and ensuring the safety of dolphins, whales, and their habitats. Explore our platform to stay informed on current and past marine incidents, track key areas for responsible marine tourism, and access valuable e-learning resources tailored for those working in marine environments. Together, we can make a difference—support our cause by donating today to help safeguard our oceans for future generations!
home.interactive_map_text: Navige dan dilo Moris avek nou Karte Entéraktif, ki montre zone rouz ek zonn zonn pou endik bann zone restrin. Kapitenn bato kapav anrezistre detay bato, inklir ler rantre ek ler sorti, ek swiv zot pozisyon an sekirite.
e-learning.main_text: Find The Best \n Online Courses \n On The Mauritian Sea Territories
